publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Montagu, Earl of Manchester by STC (2nd ed.).
With a preliminary leaf of verse.
Running title reads: Contemplatio mortis & immortalitatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
